root.name: SWAT Kats: The Radical Squadron
root.description: The SWAT Kats game for the SNES was developed by Hundson Soft in 1995, based on the popular animated series that was produced from 1993-1994. The playable characters in the game are the two protagonists from the cartoon, Chance "T-Bone" Furlong and Jake "Razor" Clawson. Aside from playing as the two heroes in 2-d platforming levels, there were also levels where the player would control the Turbokat Fighter in flying levels.
